title: I got a leaver ban for 5 games and i want it removed Please
body: My pc crashed and before i could come back the game had remade and i got a leaver ban for it and i dont have time to wait 20 mins b4 a 30 min game i would like for it to be removed please and ty

replies.body:
I'm sure you can understand that your PC crashing is neither your team or Riot's problem, no one has the time to wait 20 minutes 5 times in a row, and no one wants to deal with it. But Leaverban is **not** something you get from a **one off crash or bugsplat**, Riot are not evil corporate lords that smite down players for one off crashes, **if you leave or AFK in games consistently THEN you will be placed into low priority queue**. If your PC is crashing THAT consistently then you should probably invest in a new computer, or if it's a league of legends related problem (such as bugsplats, file errors, server problems and what not) then you can make a [support ticket here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).

But other than that there's nothing anyone can do, I suggest you just play **_co-op vs ai_** as they are the easiest to finish quickly so you can get rid of those queue timers faster. But I really suggest you find a fix to your computer problems before trying to fix your AFK/Leaver problems :( 

I hope you can sort these problems out summoner!
Good luck.
